params.text: भालू को रंग पसंद हैं।
भालू रंग को ढूंढता है।

params.alt: The bear wants to find more colours.
params.title: The bear wants to find more colours.

params.text: भूरे रंग का पेट

params.alt: The bear has a brown tummy.
params.title: The bear has a brown tummy.

params.text: नीले रंग के हाथ
हरे रंग की पीठ

params.alt: The bear has a green back.
params.title: The bear has a green back.

params.text: गुलाबी रंग के पैर

params.alt: Oops, the bear has no more colours.
params.title: Oops, the bear has no more colours.

params.text: अब कोई और रंग नहीं।

"रंग की" story credits

This work, "रंग की", is a derivative of "Colours" as translated by Alisha Berger and used under CC BY. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. "Colours" is based on the original story: रंग, by Priyanka. © Room to Read, 2015.
